metadata.synopsis: A refugee camp dialog for the tiefling kid Mirkon who we have saved from the harpies in Act 1 and from the Absolute in Act 2.

0.speaker: Mirkon
0.text: Oh, hello. I remember you, sort of. Thanks, I think? Bye!
0.context: NodeContext: chirpy but distracted - doesn't really pay attention to grown-ups.

1.speaker: Mirkon
1.text: Oh, hi. If you're here to save me again, I don't really need to be saved right now. Good thing, huh? Bye!
